website_summaries.verdict: Choose this product if you like the idea of using a mask to tackle blackheads, but keep in mind that it comes with some quirks just like other products in this category.
pros: A skin-clarifying charcoal peel-off mask that works for many users by extracting blackheads once it dries and is removed
Only requires 10 to 15 minutes of treatment time per application
cons: Can be irritating to sensitive skin, and tends to hurt a bit as it's being removed

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask!! Tried it on my boyfriend the other day and he was also blown away by it!! We are both now obsessed!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Works better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many products and this is by far the best product! When I saw my blackheads on the mask, I was surprised but glad that it was out. My skin felt smoother than before. The customer service is amazing too. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: BRAMWELL

customer_reviews.title: Super good
customer_reviews.text: This mask is amazing!! It works better than I imagined it would. I do recommend buying it. I also recommend doing it after a hot shower and after using and exfoliating face scrub that way the pores are open and no dead skin or whatever is sitting at the top of the pores making it so the mask can’t pull out the black heads.
customer_reviews.author: ChelcRae

customer_reviews.title: I am very impressed by the quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have never tried a magnet mask before and I am very impressed by the quality of this one!
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: For me, it works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I ordered this mask and use it. I was a little skeptical because of all mix reviews on the mask. So I took time and did my research. This mask is particular works with me and my skin. Be careful when applying it. I recommend apply thicker layer so it is easier to remove and pull your blackheads. But before this make sure you open your pores .
customer_reviews.author: Ameya

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Smells like nail polish and doesnt remove any pimples. Plus side, it's easy to come off. Doesnt pull the fine hair off of your face either. I couldn't give it a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I have tried using thin layers, really thick layers, and everything in between. It doesn’t work, it just hurts a lot. Didn’t remove any blackheads or pimples. The white spots on the mask that appear when you pull it off are holes. Won’t be buying this again
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Wright

customer_reviews.title: It makes a fantastic fire starter!
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. It hurt to peel off and it made my skin red, puffy, and just very obviously irritated. Immediately it smelled like Elmer's glue. When I looked at the strip I peeled off it had taken every little baby hair off my face. Hairs so small I didn't even know were on my face at all! Not worth it. I regret using it. Update: I washed the area that I had the peel on. I used my normal gentle face wash and my light moisturizer and my face still BURNS. I wouldnt be surprised if I have a chemical burn on my face it hurts that bad. The picture is about 30 minutes after removing mask.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: male reviewer with DSPT skin type. look it up
customer_reviews.text: Background info. black male with someone what dry skin with closed pores. clear in completion, i have awesome skin. when i first used it i got a single pimple on the top of my eyebrow....I simply thought i didnt clean my face properly before applying. i used it one more time. this time i made sure to clean my face with warm water and used a hot towel before applying. This time i got 2 pimples one on my left cheek the other to the right of my right eye. I couldnt blame myself. If you have my skin type this product is prob not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Maxmillian

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: This product was a serious disappointment. The only thing it took off my skin was the peach fuzz, and ripping off the mask was pretty painful too. It also left black residue in my pores and I had to immediately exfoliate to avoid getting clogged pores because of it. Oh, and there were type-o’s on the packaging/container, so I guess that should have been my first red flag!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey H

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Did not work as described. Because I was not satisfied with the product Amazon has refunded my purchase price. Funny thing is I didn’t ask for it. I just figured I’d was not for me. Amazon has always done the right thing. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: EF

customer_reviews.title: made blackheads WORSE
customer_reviews.text: Not only did this do absolutely NOTHING to pull out black heads but it actually made them WORSE! I used a face steamer to open my pores and then applied this mask. After about 20 minutes when it was totally dry I peeled it off with no blackheads at all stuck to it, but all my pores now had this black mask gunk stuck in them! Don’t even try this product unless you want your blackheads to be even more clogged and noticeable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: try again
customer_reviews.text: sorry but this stuff destroyed my skin for a few days . it never really hardened and so taking it off was a problem. the mask instantly started drying out when i was putting it on, so application was the worst. overall not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan martin

customer_reviews.title: Painful, awful, felt like I got my whole face waxed
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Painful to peel off. Skin is red, burnt, and painful. This mask is horrible
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Worst black mask I have used. It felt very thick coming out of the bottle but once on my face, it “melted” down and became very thin as it dried. I did not like the old rubbery smell it had. I could not tolerate it more than 3 times that I tried using it. It didn’t matter weather I used a thick layer or applied a thin layer, it did not come off all in one piece. It kept ripping and it did not pull anything that it was supposed to pull. It was too harsh on my skin without cleaning my pores like others I have used. I am done trying to find cheaper alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Eloisa Amorine

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It’s supposed to remove blackheads but my blackheads are still very much visible even after 4 use. It’s disappointing actually. It is so well marketed but yet, it does not do what it supposed to do. So be wise, stand clear of this. Do Not buy!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Snake oil. Reviews are paid.
customer_reviews.text: Another example of pumped up reimbursed reviews on amazon. Does not remove blackheads and I’m not sure this is actually good for your skin. The experience is someone enjoyable, but this is square in the “snake oil” category. Moreover, I received an email from Vassoul to rate the product for a $15 coupon. Went to the website and after not putting in a 5-star rating, the website spontaneously combusted! “Pay for 5-star only” is not a true solicitation to review. This is happening everywhere on amazon and throughout the web. Too good to be true usually is!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. I had hoped it would be great based off the reviews. Doesn't apply thick enough to peel off. I even tried layering it on but then it doesn't dry well. Found black bits of mask stuck in pores. Followed directions too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible...did NOTHING
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this product as the reviews were pretty good. Unfortunately it did nothing. Like NOTHING, other than take 40+ minutes to dry and leave my skin red and blotchy. I didn’t have a horrible time peeling it off like you see in videos and it was easy to spread, but it didn’t remove anything from my pores, which is a huge disappointment for $15. Wish I could return it but I don’t see the option. Two thumbs down 👎🏼👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: Sara H.

customer_reviews.title: Eh, sucked for me
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t remove my blackheads, and was a PAIN to remove (it wouldn’t peel even after like TWENTY minutes lol I had to scrub at my face), I’ll stick to my activated charcoal powder 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: oli

customer_reviews.title: Not much pull. Does NOT get rid of bigger blackheads
customer_reviews.text: The mask does leave the skin very soft, but I bought this to get rid of black heads not to soften my skin. The product is easy to apply and it doesn't hurt to remove. Personally, I am willing to accept some discomfort to clear out my pores, but if you are one of those people that gets bothered by the pulling of your skin and only have very tiny blackheads, this might be for you. If you have larger pores that require more pull, its pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: Mariadejesus

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Not satisfied at all. This is basically a thin glue you struggle to get over your face. Then struggle to get it off. It turned some of my pores black where the product did not fully come out once dried.
customer_reviews.author: patty moore

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't notice a difference in my skin and it definitely didn't pull out the blackheads like the video suggests.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Takes too long to set. Doesn’t really get anything out of your pores. It’s literally just vinyl
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Ditch the strips and buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Great mask! I started out using it twice week. Now I’m using it once a week. First time around, I applied it to my entire T-Zone. Now, I just use it on my nose. It’s really reduced the size of my pores and my blackheads are drastically improved. I like this a lot more than strips. It does a lot better job and you get a lot more bang for your buck. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: CutiePatootie1979

customer_reviews.title: Have to apply generously.
customer_reviews.text: In order for the product to be easily removed from the skin you have to apply it quit heavily, but if you do it takes longer than the 30mins to dry in spots. Also it works like a biore strip. It just removes the surface of the blackheads and doesn't stick to some. I got about 3 masks out of the tube since you have to be generous when applying. If you have sensitive skin it will irritate afterwards. I would use it again but just it keep the blackheads in check and only in the T zone of the face ( forehead, nose, and chin).
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mynatt

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money or trouble
customer_reviews.text: If you're seeking a blackhead mask to remove all your blackheads as seem in YouTube videos, this is not your product. After watching multiple YouTube videos of people removing blackheads by utilizing such a mask, I was impressed and wanted the same. All that this mask did was remove my tiny, almost invisible facial hair. Not worth the money or trouble of applying and removing.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I saw pictures of how much this stuff removed on other people and got super excited. However, when I try it, it either tried around my pores or doesn’t stick to them enough to pull them out. So, I still have many blackheads and dirty poles after use. .
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Bosley

customer_reviews.title: Not for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has sensitive skin and this mask caused her face to break out in a rash.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Two

customer_reviews.title: Bad for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to apply but hard to come off. Caused irritation to my skin and I was having a hard time peeling this off. What made this product worse is that even after I peeled it, the residue is hard to wash off, I need to use a toner and repeatly rub it off and followed with a regular face wash. I’ll pass on this and it didn’t help much with removing blackheads either.
customer_reviews.author: Amz Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T WORK!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awful! Is a pain to spread, takes forever to dry, then takes another 30 minutes to peel all the pieces off and then you just end up having to wash your face anyways. The only thing I was able to get was all my hairs pulled off my face. Not one blackhead. Huge 15 dollar rip off. Returning ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this after a couple of uses
customer_reviews.text: We have been very pleased with the mask. Myself and my wife have both used it, and we have two very different faces. She has much more sensitive skin, and did not have any issues with it on her face. Our faces were very smooth, and pleased with what it removed. We have each used it twice and there is still more product in the tube. The only recommendation I can give, is make sure to truly allow enough time for it to dry. At least 30 minutes, maybe 45. That just makes pulling off so much easier. I would recommend this to anyone looking to clean up their blackheads.
customer_reviews.author: Auburngrad

customer_reviews.title: Lame glue!
customer_reviews.text: Its black Elmer's glue for your face. Doesn't remove much at all 🚨🚨 UPDATE!! Company keeps being a nuisance by constantly sending me emails to delete my review that they will compensate me in doing so by providing a $15 Amazon gift card! Again lame product!! It sucks spend your money elsewhere!!
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I thought it would be :(
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product would’ve been better after reading the reviews. It didn’t hurt to come off at all which means it didn’t do a very good job. Nothing was on the peeled off part, no blackheads or anything. I can still see blackheads and blemishes after two uses. Disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ouch! Painful & not for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this ONE TIME about a month ago and my nose is still peeling, its spring and has been raining and looks like I got sunburnt and am peeling. My nose is so tender. I do not recommend for large spots. Maybe a pimple here and there and dont have it on that long. Very painful to remove. My experience was not great, my face was soft but the aftermath was so not worth it. OUCH!
customer_reviews.author: FishingBaseball86

customer_reviews.title: Start off small...
customer_reviews.text: Removes blackheads (and hair) very well! I would recommend using it on target areas, rather than your whole face. I had a really tough time removing it from sensitive areas like the upper cheek (under the eye) the edges of my face with more peach fuzz. Hurt so bad removing in those areas, but it did it's job! **also perfectly waxed my upper lip, chin, and around my eyebrows**
customer_reviews.author: Madi

customer_reviews.title: It works...and hurts.
customer_reviews.text: So I gave it a 4-star because IT DOES WHAT ITS MEANT TO DO. Really cleans out the funk in your face. The bad part is IT HURTS to remove, it’s not that easy because it feels like your tearing a layer of your skin off. I have sensitive skin, yet, I am normally very tolerant of pain but this huuurt Lol It leaves my face red and feeling sunburnt, but that goes away after about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: L. AA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on even around the nose area and super easy to peel off
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product - it's easy to spread, even around the nose area. It took off quite a lot of blackheads and super easy to peel off. The best thing about it is that it's the only thing my boyfriend would let me use on him. I tried to get him to use other products, but this is the one that he really liked. It takes about 10 minutes to dry and we let it stay another 5 minutes before peeling it off. It leaves my skin refreshed and I follow it up with toner. I bring it on our trips it's a great way to end our day since we do a lot of traveling. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maye B

customer_reviews.title: Love the results!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a mask that would really exfoliate and I was not disappointed. I have used other charcoal masks that didn't seem to do anything at all and I was happy with the results. My skin felt soft and smooth after use and it was really effective. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Annika Campos

customer_reviews.title: Meh, not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I’m in my early 30s, Normal to oily skin. I do a very simple facial routine 1x a week which includes cleansing, exfoliating & usually a mask or nose strips for the oil/blackheads. Although this mask pulls off some oil/dirt in pores, it leaves a lot to be desired for such a product. Did a great job at pulling out some peach fuzz around my chin. It did leave my skin softer than when I began but I overall expected more and will likely just go back to charcoal nose strips after this.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for me
customer_reviews.text: I have used the mask a couple times and the difference in my skin is huge. I don't even need to wear foundation because my skin looks great. I put on 2 generous but not really thick layers and let the mask dry for about 30 minutes and after peeling the mask, my pores are smaller and my skin is so smooth and soft. I waited about ten minutes before moisturizing my face to let my face air dry and for my pores shrink back.
customer_reviews.author: Venessa

customer_reviews.title: This is crap
customer_reviews.text: Go buy Biore strips. This does nothing remotely close to it even though it advertises it does. No black heads left on mask. Doesn't even leave your face hair-free if that's what you're looking for. Get the cheap derma face razors if you want to de-peach fuzz. This is crap and bottle is small so if it worked, it would only be for a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: D.L.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely use the little stick that comes with it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I used to spend at least 15 minutes every morning and night tweezing gunk out of my pores (especially my nose area!) just to help prevent horrible acne. Now i just smear a bit of this black mask on my problem areas every few days and it pulls all the gunk out, leaving my pores nice and clean! It even comes with a little spoon-stick to make application easy! Otherwise, youll end up exfoliating your fingertips too!
customer_reviews.author: Romily

customer_reviews.title: If I could give it zero stars I would
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work at all I had it all over my face I tried this two times and gave up I was excited to see my pores clean at least getting some of these whiteheads and blackheads out it didn’t do that it peeled off slightly painfully with nothing maybe some eyebrow hair is garbage don’t buy it
customer_reviews.author: jeannette

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion, not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Biggest con was the black product coming out of a black tube going into a small spreader. This may not be a problem for someone with good eyesight but I'm legally blind without my glasses. It took quite a while for it to dry and after peeling it off I had a slight stinging feeling. I also didn't see much improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Black

customer_reviews.title: Does the work!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has severe blackheads, I have tried several products and remedies to get rid of them. So far, I have to say this product is one of my favorites. I’ve realized that a thicker layer allows for the product to be more efficient. I have rather sensitive skin so it did leave my skin slightly red, but it was painless. Plus, it leaves a great smooth feeling! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Pak

customer_reviews.title: Works. Not painful and the applicator is nice!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this black mask. I ordered this mask as an add on item because my husband ran out of the one he was using. I was never able to use the old brand of mask because it seriously hurt to pull off. Like super painful! This didn’t hurt at all. Peels off very easily. I thought if it didn’t hurt, it probably didn’t work well. I was wrong. Got the satisfaction of a gross peeled mask that everyone enjoys. My husband had one large black head that wouldn’t budge - put a bit on and it pulled it right out. I’ll order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The bottle hardly contains anything. I used it once for my face and I believe I can get one more application out of it before it's done. Gave my cheeks reddness for a couple hours and now I have sensitivity bumps. Only to do my nose with this now on and then find a new one. I do noy recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewPerson

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of the gunk in your pores!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and definitely gets a lot of gunk out of your pores. Because it's a viscous mask you can get it in the books and crannies, like around your nostrils, which is something you can't do with the biore strips. I love using this on my nose and my chin and it makes my skin super smooth. Surprisingly this doesn't hurt as much as the biore strips either because it doesn't have to be as thick.
customer_reviews.author: Amber K.

customer_reviews.title: It clogged my pores.
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive combination skin (T-zone area is more oily). I get blackheads and white heads in the oily areas and thought I'd try one of these charcoal peeling masks. I expected it to be super-strength, like those videos where it looks painful to peel the mask off, but it wasn't. I washed my face with warm water first and even tried both steaming my face prior, and not. I was able to pull some blackheads/whiteheads, but not a significant amount. If anything, this enlarged and clogged my pores. I tried it 3 times, and same result. My pores went back to normal once I stopped using it completely.
customer_reviews.author: nancy Beltran

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: As a man i never using mask before.. because of my work place my face skin look suffers dirty and dry, so i need to take care my skin after seeing so many good comments on this product i decided to try. its my first time using something like this.. after read how to use, its easy to use and peel the mask when we put the right amount of the mask. i clean my face using warm water to open pores and dry my face. After applying the mask my skin felt brighter and smoother. This is amazing and i love it. I used at night before sleep want to used more and see the next result.
customer_reviews.author: Joys

customer_reviews.title: Be Your Own Esthetician
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought of over-payed, but then I looked at it under a magnifying glass. Ewww! There were so many black/whiteheads clogging my pores. It works and I’m happy with the outcome. Tips: 1. Place your face under steam before using the mask. I use a humidifier. 2. Wait until it completely dries. 3. Pull it off like you would a wax treatment. You’ll grab more black/whiteheads. 4. Use a soothing facial product when you’re done. My face hasn’t looked this healthy since I stopped going to my expensive but useless esthetician.
customer_reviews.author: tammie

customer_reviews.title: Guys, clean your face!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time trying a blackhead remover mask. It was easy to apply. I was surprised how it tightened my skin as it dried. It was easy to remove and I could not believe the stuff it pulled out of my face. My face was surprisingly soft. Now I understand why women get facials. As a man, I recommend this product to guys who need to pamper themselves every once in awhile. This is a great product because it works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Frugalman

customer_reviews.title: The More Uses, The Better The Results
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure if I would like this mask, but the price wasn't too bad so I thought I'd give it a try. The first time I used it, is was easy to apply, there was no foul smell, and it peeled off pretty easily. I didn't see much in the results department. However, I tried it again a few days later and I noticed an improvement to my skin. Each time I've used it since, I feel like I'm definitely seeing results...less blackheads and smaller pores. I definitely recommend this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Seitz

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the hype
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product because of all the positive reviews. First of all, it did absolutely nothing as far as removing blackheads and impurities from my skin. Second, it left my skin red, bumpy, irritated, and itchy. I'll be returning this mask and looking for a more reputable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kat H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough on pre-teens and effective
customer_reviews.text: After researching many of the black masks, we decided on this one! And was not disappointed. My 12 yr old and 9 yr old used this. My 12 year old is starting to get clogged pores and my 9 year old wanted to use it because her sister was and she has very sensitive skin. It helped with the clogged pores and did not irritate the others sensitive skin. It was easy to remove and had no smell. I can’t wait to try this on my husband as he has clogged pores around his nose. 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Athrog

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, just get the packets at your local drug store
customer_reviews.text: Smells like hair color, too tacky to spread, had to keep applying more to get full coverage, and barely pulled anything out of my pores, despite following the vague directions on the box. Honestly, I get the same result with the $.98 peel-off masks from WalMart, and they don't smell nearly as strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was nice, arrived quickly, but did not work at all. I applied as directions stated and it did not remove my blackheads at all. I was very hopeful for this products but was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: When I first applied the mask, I waited for about 40 minutes and when I took it off it came off way too easy! Nothing really get anything. Bad product and find something else
customer_reviews.author: Manuel lopez

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was on the look out for a good blackhead removal product. At first I was looking at getting those suction ones, but after research and reviews how it damaged their skin and left suction marks, I decided against it. Then, I came across this product. At first I was skeptical because, what can this do, that those biore, already cut blackhead removers can't? This product can spread anywhere you need it! It is easy to spread and can get all the problem areas. I love this product and will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas/Nikina Pate

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of this product, Vassoul Blackhead Remover Mask. Here's an application tip: It works best if it is applied in several layers over the nose - drying after each layer. (It needs to have some thickness to peel off properly.) I know it's tempting to remove quickly, but be patient and let it get bone dry. Once completely dry and with built up layers, it really pulls out a lot of gunk and works great.
customer_reviews.author: LaBelle  Coeur

customer_reviews.title: Cleanest pores ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have big pores and am constantly looking for something to help me, I do my own facials at home which include extractions but right after I steam my face I use this mask then I steam my face again and only have to extract what is left over, which is not much. The key is to steam first so your pores open and your black/white heads get soft and are easy to pull out with the mask. Its pretty thick like elmers glue and dries in about 15 mins, try it!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t rip stuff out - pulls off kinda easily
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a bad mask, but if you’re looking for something to absolutely rip off blackheads and peach fuzz and stuff, this is not the right mask. I tried it several times with different amounts of thick or thin layers and it pulls some stuff out, yes, but overall it kinda comes off with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Carney

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work.
customer_reviews.text: I prefer my Walmart black peel face mask over this. It doesn't adhere well, so nothing comes up when you peel it off, even dead skin. The only good thing I found was it does make your skin feel smooth after use. The spreader is a stiff plastic, so when applying it, you have to constantly smoothe out the lines the applicator makes in areas that aren't flat, like your nose.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lukacs

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: This didn't do the trick for me. If you're looking for a mask that will pull out your blackheads, this isn't it. It doesn't pull out much except dead skin and maybe a few blackheads. Certainly not the ones that are large, the ones you are hoping to get out. I had high hopes and this product let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Lansford

customer_reviews.title: I'm even getting compliments on zoom!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed by how much this product has worked for me. My skin looks and feels so much better since I've started using it. In fact, my boss even complemented my complexion after a zoom meeting. I told her the secret was this mask. It is easy to use. It can be slightly uncomfortable to peel if you have fine hairs on your face, but it isn't overwhelming. I HIGHLY recommend this mask!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: not worth it to me..
customer_reviews.text: I gave it three stars because it’s honestly nothing special.. based on the reviews and pictures, I was hoping it would be a heavy duty mask but it didn’t do much for me at all. It was very thin, and just felt like I was removing a piece of latex and it didn’t really remove any of my blackheads. It does smell very latex-y, and I noticed the wording on the packaging has many misspelled words and some have no spaces in between words so that just kind of shows it’s just a cheap product...
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Too Much Hype
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this mask as it is advertised everywhere. The bottle Is pretty small for price. I followed the directions and tested it out on only a portion of my lower face. Peeled off fine, I’m not a baby. I was expecting more results. Tried again a couple weeks later with covering whole face (very ambitious), terrible idea don’t do that. Took like 10 minutes peeling it off in intervals as I wipes my watering eyes, lol. Still not great results. Mask didn’t pull out as much nasty stuff as I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, First Time User
customer_reviews.text: First time ever using a mask like this and I was happy with the results. Fairly easy to spread, it even came with a small plastic piece for spreading. Took about 20-25 minutes to set and it peeled off fairly easy in one piece. Really did a great job at pulling all of the junk from my pores. My forehead was a bit red after removing the mask but wasn't too bad for the first time. Also make sure you don't cover any hair your don't want pulled out (hit a few from my beard). Overall great product, I would recommend and buy again!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Comes in a small bottle and doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was having high expectations of this product since there were so many good reviews from this product. I was kind of disappointed that I paid $15.99 for this product because it came in a small bottle thing. When I applied the product to my skin it dried pretty quick. It was easy to peel off and did not even hurt at all. And it didn’t even get rid of any blackheads. I am really disappointed in this product especially since the product was $15.99. This product is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Works for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Me and my husband both have used it twice since purchasing. I have very sensitive skin so I was surprised to find it worked so well on my skin! My problem area was my nose and it pulls those stubborn blackheads right out. Finished with a witch hazel toner and my skin felt great afterwards. Crazy to see all of the gunk it pulls from you face. Definitely sticking to this product!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strangely satisfying
customer_reviews.text: If you have peach fuzz on your face, I would suggest removing it beforehand or the mask will do it for you. I personally like that, gives my skin a more even look to it without the fine hairs. Works great and is very fun to remove! Too fun, maybe. My boyfriend made his face a little irritated because he did two masks in a row. Our skin feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the good reviews
customer_reviews.text: This product was somewhat easy to spread on the face, the little thing used to spread it was way too small and I prefered to use the one I had at home. The product itself was mediocre, it didn't peel off easily yet it felt like it didn't clean or unclogged any pores. Usually, with other peel-off face masks you feel the product peel off your face and this felt like taking off sheet masks. Also, they try to bribe you for a good review. I thought this product was great because of the reviews and stars but it was a waste of 15 dollars, will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gianela Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Vassoul Blackhead Remover Mask, Peel Off Blackhead Mask
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time trying Vassoul Blackhead Remover Mask, Peel Off Blackhead Mask. I was looking for a mask that will actually pull all that dirt out of my pores that my daily cleansers miss. I must say I was pleasantly surprised! It comes I’m with a cute little spatula and you just put the product on the spatula for an easy application to your face: just watch your eyebrows ! When this stuff drys it actually pull that extra dry skin, oil, blackhead and white heads. When I have a breakout it actually helps my acne heal faster. I would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Ashfor

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely works and took a few seconds to grasp the bottom of the mask to pull upwards / off. Wow, a little ouch at first but it lifted off what the product claims. Also, it really left my skin feeling smooth.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This thing was completely ineffective. When I used it I saw little holes for where the pores were but hardly any of the gunk actually came out.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Really good face mask!
customer_reviews.text: Was in the need for some good self care and found this mask with great reviews and decided to give it a try! Great value and it did not disappoint! Super easy to spread and peel off style was so cleansing and invigorating. Feels like layers of dead cells pulled off and skin so fresh after! I have sensitive skin and have had no problems with this mask - I use it at least once a week!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Painless and leaves the skin smooth
customer_reviews.text: This blackhead remover mask does exactly what it's supposed to do - remove blackheads. Following the instructions is important. You have to use a warm/hot cloth beforehand to open the pores! Once that's done, applying the mask is pretty easy, it is thick, but it has to be to work right. Wait 30 mins or so until it's completely dry, peel off, and observe the gunk. After use my skin looked really nice soft. No irritation or redness. Good results.
customer_reviews.author: Tad

customer_reviews.title: Ouch.
customer_reviews.text: This was very difficult to remove and quite painful. It takes ALL the top layers. AND the peach fuzz. Slowly... I peeled it off 10 minutes ago and my face still hurts.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Wow this really works!
customer_reviews.text: I have always suffered from blackheads on my nose and large open pores. One use stripped 99% of the blackheads out and closed my pores leaving my nose smooth and clear looking. Absolutely amazing! Its really easy to apply and strips off super easy as well. Just slowly peel up and edge and peel off in seconds. I can't recommend this product highly enough. Just reordering a second tube now.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Sunny Las Vegas

customer_reviews.title: 2/5 for clearing pores, 5/5 for waxing your face
customer_reviews.text: Was decently disappointed by this mask. I have very tough skin, so I was hoping this mask would be able to penetrate and get all that gunk out of my enormous blackheads. I went though the WHOLE bottle, multiple different uses and different method to open my friggin pores up, including holding a steamer away from my face (do not recommend), and still couldn’t get this sucker to pull anything out. However the reason people say that it’s painful is because it’ll pull out all your little face hairs, giving you a nice wax. Would possibly purchase it again solely for a good at-home wax, but definitely not for a face mask.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Ward

customer_reviews.title: So satisfying!
customer_reviews.text: This mask really did work. After peeling it off, I could see tons of gunk that I had no idea was even in my skin. It actually wasn't that hard or painful to peel off as some reviews state, and did not leave my skin red or irritated. I do recommend pulling back all of your hair with a headband and avoiding entire eye area/eyebrows and lip to avoid too many small hairs being ripped out. Also be sure to wash your face with warm water first to open up your pores and really make the most of the mask. I use 1-2x a week and have seen a big drop in blackheads!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha F.

customer_reviews.title: Leaves your skin soft and glowing
customer_reviews.text: What an excellent mask! My husband and I are obsessed with peel-off masks so I had to include this one as a stocking stuffer this year. As soon as the Christmas chaos was cleaned up and the kids were out for the night we opened this up, applied it to our faces, sipped some wine, and waited for it to dry while doing some well deserved relaxing!! The squeeze tube makes application neat and easy... the mask itself spreads like a dream... and peeling off is so satisfying. Our faces were soft and glowing afterwards. Would definitely recommend this to anyone who likes peel off masks!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm always hesitant with peel off masks but I really needed something for blackheads and nothing was working! I love this stuff, it peels off so easy and makes your skin feel like a babies bum. I do have sensitive /combination skin and it doesn't irritate me. I use this mask about two times per week. Give it a try, you won't be disappointed! Please remember when doing any kind of mask-your skin it not going to magically be clear after taking it off.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: A Spa Like Experience
customer_reviews.text: It is like going to the spa for a facial but more convenient and way cheaper. I have tried just about every blackhead remover mask in Walmart and have given up hope until I tried this one!! Truly amazing! Easy to put on (avoid the eyebrows please!) and the results are absolutely fantastic. I have sensitive skin and this product did not bother my face at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rini

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased to find out that this worked as good as the reviews said. I've always had problems cleaning the pores on my chin and finally I have found the solution. I definitely recommend. Leaves your face feeling very soft and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt hurt and works well
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. Dries good and hard so it's pretty easy to peel off. Took a ton of stuff out of my pores so it visibly works well. Not sure what the bad reviews about it hurting were about. Pretty sure their just gigantic babies because it didn't hurt and my skins pretty sensitive especialy on my face so cowboy up and give it a whirl.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Wished this worked but it’s completely ineffective
customer_reviews.text: Was really disappointed by this product. It didn’t remove any blackheads etc from my pores. The only thing it actually did well was to painfully rip out all that little fine hairs on my face and bits of skin. I tried it again just to give it the benefit of the doubt, thinking that since it already ripped out the hair on my face, maybe this time it will actually remove the blackheads. It removed nothing. I don’t recommend this product. Save yourself the money and just buy a box of Biore strips.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for almost 2 weeks and have done a few masks. I don't have super clogged pores but it still pulls out some stuff each time. I feel super clean and my skin is so smooth after. I have very sensitive skin and allergies to a lot of skin products but this has had absolutely no negative side effects or reactions. I did try a small spot first just to make sure before doing the full mask!
customer_reviews.author: Katie A. Frey

customer_reviews.title: BEST BLACKHEAD MASK
customer_reviews.text: I have super sensitive skin that happens to be very oily with a lot of blackheads, mostly on my chin. I saw great reviews so I bought it even though I was skeptical and this actually pulled my blackheads out!!! This has done more than any charcoal strips or masks I've ever used before. I apply generously, and it's super easy to spread too. I will definitely buy more after I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Daria

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy a second time.
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was going to help me pull out all my black and white heads like it shows in the picture but it did not, super disappointed. If you still decide to buy, make sure to spread it on thick, let it completely dry, and peel from the bottom up. If your lucky maybe you'll pull out 1 or 2 black heads.
customer_reviews.author: phuong nga huynh tran

customer_reviews.title: Love the way it makes my face feel after using it.
customer_reviews.text: This mask is very thick and doesn't run down my face. Love the way my skin feels after I use it. Easy to remove. I've been using it for only 2 times, noticed some difference in my pors hoping with every use it will get better. Also I am glad I had a little thing that helps me spread it on my face because this mask is think and sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Katya  Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Worked awesomely!!!😃
customer_reviews.text: I have had previous breakouts and I couldn’t seem to get rid of all the pimples, blackheads, and everything else. It got to the point where I trues different makeup brands and that still didn’t do it. I purchased a blackhead tool and I feel like I didn’t get everything and to get a lot I had to push really hard and it was painful. I went on amazon looking for masks and this popped up. I looked at the reviews and they were great so I decided to purchase this mask. Once I tried it I felt like it worked miracles! I loved it! My face has never been so clear!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Reeb

customer_reviews.title: SUCCESS
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely thrilled with how well this product has removed the blackheads around my nose. This is the fourth facemask product I have tried and the first to actually work. I have very oily skin around my nose and for the first time in my life, my nose felt hairless, smooth, and oil free. Additionally, this product has a competitive price relative to other face masks I tried (that did not have nearly the same results).
customer_reviews.author: Frappé George

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as well
customer_reviews.text: This one doesn't seem to work as well as others. It isn't as tacky or difficult to remove but that just means that it's lower strength. I can still see blackheads on my nose after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I had a pretty bad blackhead problem and so after reading raving reviews I decided to try this. I have already used this for two weeks, and I have seen no results. At first, I thought maybe my skin's pores are not open or something. But then it fails to remove small hair as well. Forget blackheads!!
customer_reviews.author: Sahib

customer_reviews.title: Did not remove my blackheads
customer_reviews.text: It does remove oil and exfoliate. However, it did not remove any of my blackheads. I did before and after photos and did not notice any difference other than less oil/shine
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy peel off mask, fresh face revealed!
customer_reviews.text: This black mask feels great once I peel it off, my face feels lighter and cleaner without the gunk on my face, plus it removes a little bit of the peach fuzz. It is easy to put it on and easy to remove. Peel from chin up, avoid the eyebrows, and if you put it on thick it is easier to peel off. Definitely will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders to unclog my pores and exfoliate my peeling dry skin
customer_reviews.text: My Mom got this for me for Christmas and I'm obsessed with it! I've been having problems with my nose peeling constantly, and I exfoliate once a week but then the dead skin would just peel again. Now I use this peel off mask after I exfoliate, and it removes all the extra dead skin that I wasn't previously able to get rid of, and my skin stays softer and smoother so much longer! It's amazing to see how much junk it pulls out of my pores that I didn't know was in there. It's like my face can breathe better afterwards. I'll definitely continue using and purchasing this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good even for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: So, I have very sensitive skin, to the point that salicylic acid treatment actually irritates my skin more than it helps in some cases. As such, I have to resort to a standard cleansers to help my face and taking a chance on this product had me on the fence. However, I've used it three times so far and no complaints! My face does feel pretty nice after peeling off the mask. If you've never used products like this before, this is a very safe and affordable option.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

product_meta.title: VASSOUL Blackhead Remover Mask, Peel Off Blackhead Mask, Black Mask - Deep Cleansing Facial Mask for Face & Nose
product_meta.description: Vassoul Blackhead Remover Mask, Peel Off Blackhead Mask - Deep Cleansing Black Mask, Bamboo Activated Charcoal Peel-Off Mask
feature_bullets: Deep Facial Cleansing: Remove acne, blackheads, and blemishes. Help to remove stubborn stain or oil spots on your face.
Multi-Purpose: Reduces the effect of computer radiation on the skin, adds vitality to dull and uneven skin, and makes the skin firmer.
Give you Younger and Smoother Skin: Moisturize your skin, giving it a wonderful feel. And it can also remove the facial hair on your face to make it very smooth and healthy.
Improved Blood Circulation: Improves skin blood circulation, and generally contributes to a younger, healthier skin.
Easy to Use: Completely easy to use mask that comes with basic instructions so you can put it to use right out of the box.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
